pageContent: Objective: •To determine if the prostate-specific antigen (PSA) nadir after high-intensity focused ultrasound (HIFU) can be used as a predictor of the biochemical disease-free survival rate (DFSR).

metaData.source:
Does MRI-guided TULSA provide a targeted approach to ablation?
